channel.title: math.SP updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SP updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Upper bounds for the second nonzero eigenvalue of the Laplacian via folding and conformal volume
item.description: arXiv:2501.08761v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove an upper bound for the volume-normalized second nonzero eigenvalue of the Laplace operator on closed Riemannian manifold, in terms of the conformal volume. This bound provides effective upper bound for a large class of manifolds, thereby generalizing many known results.
item.dc:creator: Mehdi Eddaoudi, Alexandre Girouard
